gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਜੋਤ ਕੋ ੳੁਦੋਤ ਭੲਿਓ ਤ੍ਰਿਭਵਨ ਅੳੁ ਤ੍ਰਿਕਾਲ ਅੰਤਰਿ ਦਿਖਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Jot Ko Udot Bhaiao , Tribhavan Au Trikaal Antari Dikhaaay Hai ?
translation: With the absorption of his mind in the divine word, a devoted servant of the Guru experiences the radiance of the Lord within, and in such a state, he becomes aware of the happenings three worlds and in the three periods.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਗਾਸ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਬਿਨੋਦ ਅਲਖ ਲਖਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Gurmati Ko Pragaasa , Akad Kadaa Binod Alakh Lakhaaay Hai ?
translation: With the lodging of the divine word in the consciousness Guru-conscious person, he experiences the refulgence of the divine wisdom within. And in this state, he establishes a relationship with the God and enjoys lasting bliss. He then understands the unkn

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਨਿਝਰ ਅਪਾਰ ਧਾਰ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਰਸ ਰਸਿਕ ਹੁੲਿ ਅਪੀਅਾ ਪੀਅਾੲੇ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Nijhar Apaar Dhaara , Praym Ras Rasik Hui Apeeaa Peeaaay Hai ?
translation: By his engrossment in the word, he experiences a perpetual flow of elixir of Naam from the Dasam Duar and he continuously enjoys its relishment.

gurmukhi: ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਲਿਵ ਸੋਹੰ ਸੋਹ ਅਜਪਾ ਜਾਪ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਸੁਖ ਸਾਗਰ ਸਮਾੲੇ ਹੈ ॥੭੭॥
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Sohan Soh Ajapaa Jaapa , Sahaj Samaadhi Soukh Saagar Samaaay Hai ?77?
translation: This engrossment of his consciousness attaches him with the comforting and peace-giving Lord and he remains absorbed meditating on His name. (77)
